STATE v. SCOTT. No. COA05-1144. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 18, 2006. Certification Date May 8, 2006. Appeal from the Buncombe (04CRS53048, 04CRS53049, 04CRS53050, 04CRS53051, 04CRS53052, 04CRS53053, 04CRS53054, 04CRS53055, 04CRS53056, 04CRS53057, 04CRS53058, 04CRS53059, 04CRS53060, 04CRS53061, 04CRS53062, 04CRS53063, 04CRS53064, 04CRS53065, 04CRS53066, 04CRS53067, 04CRS53068, 04CRS53069, 04CRS53070, 04CRS53071, 04CRS53072, 04CRS53073, 04CRS53074).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part; remand for correction of clerical errors.
